div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 607 Valea Calugareasca, 10 km. E of Ploiesti, Rumania, 1963 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: c. 300 AR. Pot hoard Apollonia, Illyria, and Dyrrhachium: dr. Disposition: Ploiesti 282; Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) 1 Mitrea, Dacia 1965, p. 492; 1967, p. 382
